TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Do a striptease

Did I just break the ToS?

Yes, now Zalgo has sent mice from Magrathea to KILL YOU!!!!!!!!!

How do I ask a question?

By using the Deathstar to destroy Earth

How does SWAG?

By "Saying We Are Guys"

How do I fly a plane?

Planes don't fly, they drive. If you've ever seen a plane flying, it's being done by a wizard. Contact Hogwarts immediately, they have a few on the loose.

How do I fly a boat?

you sink

how do i avoid stupid?

By limiting your exposure to politicians.

How do I fallout?

By opening the door while driving.

How do I explosively decompress my car?

change a tire

how do i type slower?

Cut off all your fingers but one.

How do I wash my car?

Rub it with sandpaper, and finish by throwing rocks at it. The larger the rock the better it cleans.

Why can't turtles fly?

Because they ran out of jet fuel.

How do I get rid of a blood stain?

Edited May 9, 2014 by InterCity

with blood-flavored ketchup

how do i poo?

By taking a dump.

How do i Hohmann transfer?

By burning while pointing at the planet.

Why we don't have infinite lives?

Because we haven't entered the Konami code.

Why did men's hats ever go out of style?

Because men's hair came into style.

Why can't I, carry all these questions?

(The grammar looks like that in the meme, don't beat me up ._.)

Because you've added a useless comma.

Why can't I breathe in space?

Because you're a meatbag.

Should I fear a robot uprising?

You should and you should not.

What is the cheat to have infinite money?

type "HESOYAM" until your money counter reaches "999999999999$". (GTA San Andreas)

Why there is no shutdown button on women?

Because they're too hard to turn back on. I mean... Does not compute.

Why do I have the urge to turn anything into a euphemism?

Because you fear you'll end being banned, for real, if you don't.

Why always meeeeeee?

Infinite Improbability Drive.

How long until the next explosion?

KABOOOM! It took approx. 13 hours, depending on your current timezone.

Why am I too daft to remember where I put my keys but still able to solve equations in a flash?
